title: Help with a pseudo-deco font?
content:
This one has me stumped. Note the cross members on the A and E. Anyone know the name of this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106145853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pere_6124.gif)

 [‹ Rounded Grotesque in New York Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106145853/http:/typophile.com/node/40577 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Chapter listing inside Mighty Boosh DVDs - Cheapskate {BJ Harvey} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106145853/http:/typophile.com/node/40293 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tonie Blaze

comments.content: Some poorly done imitation of Anna.
I think this is an amateur take on [ITC Anna](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106145853/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/itc_anna_book_ot/).
Twice in a little over a week. What the heck is the world comin’ to?
